parameters.name: numTrials
parameters.description: Number of experimental trials (half present, half absent)

parameters.name: numLines
parameters.description: Total number of lines to draw on each trial

parameters.name: fieldWidth
parameters.description: Width of the search field in pixels

parameters.name: fieldHeight
parameters.description: Height of the search field in pixels

parameters.name: gutter
parameters.description: Margin between field border and lines in pixels

parameters.name: lineLength
parameters.description: Length of each line in pixels

parameters.name: minDistance
parameters.description: Minimum distance between items in pixels (for non-grid layout)

parameters.name: gridRows
parameters.description: Number of rows in grid layout (when numLines > 100)

parameters.name: gridCols
parameters.description: Number of columns in grid layout (when numLines > 100)

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Total task duration in milliseconds (default 5 minutes)
